programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

programme.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
programme.desc: The story revolves around the lives of four guys named Gopal, Lucky, Madhav, and Laxman who all absurdly fall for the same girl. Hence, begins the hilarious race to win her heart.

programme.title: I M 24
programme.desc: I M 24 is the story of a middle-aged man who lies to a wannabe beauty queen about his age and appearance while chatting on an online portal. Watch what happens when the girl decides to pay a personal visit to her online friend.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Ek Chitthi Pyar Bhari
programme.desc: Dr. Sunil Sharma hires a young nurse Aarti who had responded to his clinic's ad posted in a newspaper. He starts developing feelings for her and his mother also wants them to get married soon. However they are completely unaware of her dark past.

programme.title: Auzaar
programme.desc: Suraj, a CBI officer, learns that his childhood friend Yash and his father run an illegal business. He is assigned to investigate Yash, but he decides to convince Yash to mend his ways.

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem, a free-spirited boy, falls in love with a young girl Jenny. However, when he learns that she is in love with her college sweetheart, Rahul, Prem sacrifices his love and helps Jenny to get married to the love of her life.
